dmca.title: Stolen content
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Debra/Alliance-Link [mailto:debra@alliance-link.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, September 13, 2006 12:08 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Stolen content
Subject: Re: Stolen content


Dear The Planet:
 
Below is a written request as per the exact guidelines outlined in the
DMCA for reporting copyright infringement.
The same information is also attached via word document to this email
AND uploaded to my website.
http://www.alliance-link.com/Copyright-theft1.htm
 
Please remove the page immediately.  thank you.
 
Debra Mastaler
Alliance-Link.com
 
Proposed Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement

On www.alliance-link.com <http://www.alliance-link.com/>  and all pages
contained in said domain.

As outlined in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act:
http://www.copyright.gov//legislation/hr2281.pdf
<http://www.copyright.gov/legislation/hr2281.pdf> 

 

 

Name of copyright holder: 



             Debra O. Mastaler, also known as Alliance-Link.com

 

Name of person authorized to act on behalf of copyright holder:
          
             Debra O. Mastaler

 

Identify the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed:



"We create customized link marketing campaigns to drive traffic, support
ongoing search engine optimization efforts and build brand awareness for
your e-business through creative linking.

Our Custom Link Building Campaigns focus on securing one-way links from
quality, relevant, on-topic websites within your industry niche. We
don't use automated programs, spam our sources or send canned email.
Each potential link partner is carefully reviewed and cataloged for
personal follow-up

Our Campaigns are focused, long-term and uniquely created for your site.
They are a combination of classical marketing and online promotional
tactics for maximum sales and search engine rankings.

Our linking strategies are Marketing strategies, so you won't find us
slapping up links on non-relevant sites or engaging in large scale link
exchanges.  We're thoughtful, creative and most importantly - effective!

Some of our Custom Link Building Services include:

*    Link Promotions .  Attracting links through special offers.  

*    Link Library. Content creation to attract links organically.    

*    Contextual Link Buys.  Link advertising  

*    Article and Press Releases - Creation and distribution   

*    Link Recovery -  Putting the power of anchor text
<http://www.alliance-link.com/link-building-campaigns.htm>  to work. 

All Custom Link Building Campaigns require a pre-paid one-on-one
telephone consultation  to review current link status, outline goals and
determine link building tactics to be implemented for maximum benefit.
It's our goal to make your site successful, support on-going SEO efforts
and work toward building your brand. "


Original  material above can be found on 
http://www.alliance-link.com/custom-link-building.htm and can be seen on
the Way Back Machine also known as Archive.org from January 2005.

http://web.archive.org/web/20050301063658/alliance-link.com/custom-link-
campaigns.htm



 

 

 

 

 

If multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification,

include a representative list of such works at that site:


          All pages registered under domain www.alliance-link.com
<http://www.alliance-link.com/>  are fully copyrighted to the 
          website and it's owner, Debra Mastaler.

 

 

Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be
the subject of

Infringing activity that is to be removed or access to which is to be
disabled:

 

Material found here:  
http://internetmarketingorlando.com/v2/index.php?option=com_content&task
=view&id=18&Itemid=41  Specifically:  

 

Link Building Campaigns.

We create customized link marketing campaigns to drive traffic, support
ongoing search engine optimization efforts and build brand awareness for
your e-business through creative linking.

Our Custom Link Building Campaigns focus on securing one-way links from
quality, relevant, on-topic websites within your industry niche. We
don't use automated programs, spam our sources or send canned email.
Each potential link partner is carefully reviewed and cataloged for
personal follow-up

Our Campaigns are focused, long-term and uniquely created for your site.
They are a combination of classical marketing and online promotional
tactics for maximum sales and search engine rankings.

Our linking strategies are Marketing strategies, so you won't find us
slapping up links on non-relevant sites or engaging in large scale link
exchanges.  We're thoughtful, creative and most importantly - effective!

Some of our Custom Link Building Services include:

*         Link Promotions .  Attracting links through special offers.  

*         Link Library. Content creation to attract links organically.


*         Contextual Link Buys.  Link advertising  

*         Article and Press Releases - Creation and distribution 
  

All Custom Link Building Campaigns require a pre-paid one-on-one
telephone consultation  to review current link status, outline goals and
determine link building tactics to be implemented for maximum benefit.
It's our goal to make your site successful, support on-going SEO efforts
and work toward building your brand.

Note:  This is a long term link building service designed to compliment
your SEO and/or Marketing  efforts.   Campaigns usually run three to
nine months. Contact us today to schedule a consultation for a Custom
Link Building Campaign!

Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
locate the material:

 

Domain/page with stolen text:  
http://internetmarketingorlando.com/v2/index.php?option=com_content&task
=view&id=18&Itemid=41

 

Page in Archive.org dated Jan 2005 showing same text from MY site:

http://web.archive.org/web/20050301063658/alliance-link.com/custom-link-
campaigns.htm

 

This page has 259 words matching your text, as highlighted below
<javascript:void(window.location.hash='copyscape_start');>  by
Copyscape.

 

http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=82130&u=http%3A%2F%2Finternetmarketi
ngorlando.com%2Fv2%2Findex.php%3Foption%3Dcom_content%26task%3Dview%26id
%3D18%26Itemid%3D41&t=1158166232&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.alliance-link.com%2F
custom-link-building.htm&w=18&c=

 

 

Name of complaining party:

 

Debra O. Mastaler, owner  www.alliance-link.com

 

Address: 

 

2594 Jockey's Neck Trail  Williamsburg, VA  23185

 

Telephone number:

 

757 229 2665

 

Email:  

 

debra@alliance-link.com

 

I hereby affirm, as the complaining party, that I believe in good faith
that the use of the

material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
holder, its agent

or the law.

I hereby affirm, under penalty of perjury, that the information
contained in this

notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of
the holder of the

exclusive right that I claim to be infringed.

 

Debra O. Mastaler

 

 

 

 

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Copyright <mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com>  
        To: debra@alliance-link.com 
        Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
        Sent: Tuesday, September 12, 2006 5:13 PM
        Subject: FW: Stolen content

        To Whom It May Concern:

         

        Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice
does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

         

        Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of
your claim.

         

        Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

         

        Legal Response Team

        THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

        From: Debra/Alliance-Link [mailto:debra@alliance-link.com] 
        Posted At: Tuesday, September 12, 2006 10:44 AM
        Posted To: Legal Response
        Conversation: Stolen content
        Subject: Fw: Stolen content
        
        
        Emailing to a new email address with request to have page
removed per DMCA guidelines.
         
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Debra/Alliance-Link <mailto:debra@alliance-link.com>  
        To: abuse@theplanet.com 
        Sent: Monday, September 11, 2006 10:54 PM
        Subject: Fw: Stolen content

        Second request.  Please have this page removed as per the DMCA.

         
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Debra/Alliance-Link <mailto:debra@alliance-link.com>  
        To: abuse@theplanet.com 
        Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2006 9:02 PM
        Subject: Stolen content

        This website:  www.internetmarketingorlando.com has 
        
        taken a full page of content off my site   
http://www.alliance-link.com/custom-link-building.htm  and placed it
here:
         
        
http://internetmarketingorlando.com/v2/index.php?option=com_content&task
=view&id=18&Itemid=41
         
        Since the www.internetmarketingorlando.com site was created in
Feb 2006 and as you can see through Archive.org my pages have been
online longer
         
        
http://web.archive.org/web/20050301063658/alliance-link.com/custom-link-
campaigns.htm
         
        I want internetmarketingorlando.com to remove my verbiage at
once.
         
        thank you.
         
         
        Debra O. Mastaler
        Alliance-Link
        http://thelinkspiel.blogspot.com
